Text: EBS ASP business and MSFTToday I had a good discussion with David Cox Scott Yeager about EBS development and Id like to share with you some of our ideas The meeting was influenced by our developing relationship with Microsoft I know that you are taking an active part in building our relationship with MSFT and thought that it might be interesting for you to go through this internal discussion paper Best regards Boris
